hero.label: Universal Checkout Protocol
hero.title: One checkout protocol for every service
hero.description: Unify checkout across Shopify, Polar, and custom providers. Stateless forms driven entirely by URL parameters -- no sessions, no database, fully shareable and resumable.

templates.label: Try it now
templates.title: Pre-built checkout templates
templates.description: Click any template to launch a fully-populated checkout. Every field is encoded in the URL -- stateless, shareable, and resumable.

features.label: How it works
features.title: Built for modern commerce
features.description: Every design decision serves stateless, type-safe checkout flows that integrate with any service.

items.title: Stateless & URL-Driven
items.description: Every checkout state lives in the URL. No sessions, no cookies, no database required. Share, bookmark, or resume any checkout.

items.title: Zod-Validated Pipelines
items.description: Each form section is independently validated with Zod schemas. Type-safe from URL params through server actions.

items.title: Progressive Enhancement
items.description: Forms work without JavaScript via native FormData and server actions. Progressive enhancement with nuqs for real-time URL sync.

items.title: Service Delegation
items.description: Delegate payment to Polar, fulfillment to Shopify, or any provider. UCP is the glue between your checkout and external services.

items.title: Multi-Payment Support
items.description: Token-based or card-based credentials via a discriminated union schema. Extensible to any payment handler.

items.title: Composable Forms
items.description: Each form section uses formId to wire inputs anywhere in the DOM. Sections submit independently or together as a full checkout.

integrations.label: Integrations
integrations.title: Connect your services
integrations.description: UCP delegates to specialized services. Plug in payment providers, storefronts, and content systems.

items.shopify: Sync products, manage inventory, and fulfill orders through the Shopify Storefront API.
items.polar: Accept payments and manage subscriptions with Polar. Delegate payment processing seamlessly.
items.cms: Create SEO-optimized product pages. Publish content that ranks and converts.
items.effect: Typed, composable server-side business logic with EffectTS. Governs validation, enrichment, and processing pipelines.

roadmap.label: Development Status
roadmap.title: Current Progress & Roadmap
roadmap.description: Track the evolution of UCP. We're building in public with full transparency.

foundation.title: Foundation Complete âœ…
foundation.description: URL-driven state management with nuqs, Zod validation schemas, and composable UI components are production-ready.

observability.title: Pipeline Observability
observability.description: Event logging, checksum verification, and runtime tracing for trustless commerce.

dashboard.title: Visual Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time pipeline monitoring, event streams, and handler health visualization.

distribution.title: npm Publishing
distribution.description: Publish @ucp/entities, @ucp/pipeline, and handler packages for easy adoption.

tooling.title: Developer Tools
tooling.description: create-ucp CLI for instant project bootstrapping and documentation.

development.label: Open Development
development.title: Built with transparency
development.description: Every feature, every decision, every line of code is tracked in GitHub issues. Follow along, contribute, or fork for your needs.

cta.title: Ready to unify your checkout?
cta.description: Start with the live demo. Every field you fill becomes a URL parameter -- stateless, shareable, and ready for production.

checkoutSections.shippingDescription: Where the order will be delivered

confirm.heading: Checkout Ready
confirm.description: Your checkout session has been prepared. Review the details below.
confirm.name: Name

product.title: Create Product
product.description: Fill in product details using the form below. Every field syncs to URL parameters -- share the URL to let others edit, or generate a checkout link to test the full purchase flow.
product.detailsDescription: Define your product. All fields become URL parameters for stateless sharing.

product.nameDescription: The public name shown to buyers
product.descriptionDescription: Detailed product description for SEO and buyer context
